TextLibrary.Text: Just got word that the LeapGates are offline, so those techs won't get to your pal's message any time soon. We might want to fly over there and check it out ourselves.
Just got word that the LeapGates are offline, so those techs won't get to your pal's message any time soon. We might want to fly over there and check it out ourselves.
The LeapGates are offline? That's unusual.
The LeapGates are offline? That's unusual.

Yeah, well... centuries old technology... whatcha gonna do? They'll be up soon enough. In the mean time, we should get ourselves to the Ceti LeapGate and check out his message. I'll tag along again if you don't mind. I kinda like this ship.

Yeah, well... centuries old technology... whatcha gonna do? They'll be up soon enough. In the mean time, we should get ourselves to the Ceti LeapGate and check out his message. I'll tag along again if you don't mind. I kinda like this ship.
